Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Midway. Service is resuming, allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Midway.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
